thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc. Announces Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.19

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc. Announces Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.19
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Floor & Decor Holdings Inc:
* FLOOR & DECOR HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 24.4 PERCENT * SEES Q1 NET SALES $397 MILLION - $402 MILLION
* SEES Q1 COMPARABLE STORE SALES 14.0% TO 15.0% * SEES Q1 DILUTED EPS $0.22 - $0.23
* SEES 2018 NET SALES $1,690 MILLION - $1,730 MILLION
* SEES 2018 COMPARABLE STORE SALES 8.5% TO 11.5% * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.18, REVENUE VIEW $387.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 DILUTED EPS $0.91 - $1.00
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.20 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $140 MILLION - $150 MILLION
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.00 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.00, REVENUE VIEW $1.74 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $395.7 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
